messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Mike Fishery Thirteen. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on scans from our long-range sensors, we believe that one of the station's lesser lifeforms has developed [REDACTED] level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.
